verses.name: Exodus 19:7
verses.text: And Moses came and called for the elders of the people, and laid before their faces all these words which the Lord commanded him.

verses.name: Exodus 19:8
verses.text: And all the people answered together, and said, All that the Lord hath spoken we will do. And Moses returned the words of the people unto the Lord.

verses.name: Exodus 19:9
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Moses, Lo, I come unto thee in a thick cloud, that the people may hear when I speak with thee, and believe thee for ever. And Moses told the words of the people unto the Lord.
